alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 24 at 7:40PM MDT until June 25 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT SUNDAY... ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT MONDAY... ...HEAT ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the first Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 107 expected. For the second Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 108 expected. * WHERE...Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...For the first Heat Advisory, from Noon to 8 PM MDT Sunday. For the second Heat Advisory, from Noon to 8 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
